name: Pack of Cards
description:
This is a work in progress, Play Poker with Lily.

This is a very early prototype of a game where you are sent by a king to retrieve funds that were embezzled by his closest allies. 

I will be re uploading this game once it is finished. This is as far as I could go in the the time frame given.

Note: There is place holder texts, and no win condition. The game MAY crash if you go into negative chips. So Perhaps that for now can be the ending.  I will be uploading a finished version once it is complete.

A Link to the artists Fiverr account.

 Feel free to commission her for any work you'd like. You can also DM her on her Twitter.

Here is some concept art.
